references.paper_title: COMET: A neural framework for MT evaluation
references.reason: This paper introduces COMET, the core quality estimation model that the current paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: High quality rather than high model probability: Minimum Bayes risk decoding with neural metrics
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Minimum Bayes Risk decoding with neural metrics, which is relevant to the reranking task addressed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Disentangling uncertainty in machine translation evaluation
references.reason: This paper addresses the challenge of uncertainty estimation in machine translation, a key focus of the current work.
This paper presents an approach to uncertainty estimation using Monte Carlo dropout, which the current paper compares against.

references.paper_title: Findings of the 2023 conference on machine translation (WMT23): LLMs are here but not quite there yet
references.reason: This paper provides the dataset used for training and evaluating the quality estimation models in the current research.
